Sleepy Mountain Lion



He eventually woke up, yawned, and stared down Stephen through the glass. Unfortunately the reflections prevented me from getting another good shot.
Taken Wednesday, January 30, 2008, 12:33:33AM. Original image size: 3072x2048, 1.1Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/50s @ F5.6, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 200mm (320mm equiv)
PS CRW Daylight, 0.15:10:50:25:15
